MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth, affecting properties in Coldingham and surrounding areas. Engineers managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and we still expect all power to be restored by 5AM. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.52AM on 3rd December 2020.
